trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration StateMachineStateQuery element in DotNetConfig.xsd.
trans-unit.target: 表示 DotNetConfig.xsd 組態 StateMachineStateQuery 項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Tracking.Configuration.StateMachineStateQueryElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Tracking.Configuration.StateMachineStateQueryElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity name filter attribute in StateMachineTrackingQuery element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 StateMachineTrackingQuery 項目中的活動名稱篩選條件屬性。

trans-unit.source: The activity name filter attribute in StateMachineTrackingQuery element.
trans-unit.target: StateMachineTrackingQuery 項目中的活動名稱篩選條件屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a StateMachine-specific CustomTrackingQuery, if the user specifies StateMachineTrackingQuery element in app.config.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者在 app.config 中指定 StateMachineTrackingQuery 項目，請建立 StateMachine 特定 CustomTrackingQuery。

trans-unit.source: A CustomTrackingQuery instance that tracks StateMachine specific TrackingRecord.
trans-unit.target: 會追蹤 StateMachine 特定 TrackingRecord CustomTrackingQuery 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the attributes in StateMachineTrackingQuery element.
trans-unit.target: StateMachineTrackingQuery 項目中取得的屬性。
在 StateMachineTrackingQuery 元素的屬性。
